attributes.action: to be fair with the bailout of the Car Industry, and protect those on the front line in the dealer networks as well as the manufacturers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is all good and well helping the people that manufacturer the cars, but somebody needs to sell them. Due to the current climate, there are delaer chains large and small closing every week, and several large dealer groups, whom employ several thousand UK citizens struggling to keep going. Take a look at the FTSE. Be fair with the car industry bailout, and protect the many thousands of hardworking Sales People, Technicians, Administrators, Accountants etc... that could be without a job in the near future.
